dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5871 IH: Dollar is a Dollar Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To tax capital gains at the same rate as ordinary income.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Dollar is a Dollar Act.

section.header: Repeal of capital gains tax cap
section.text: Subsection (h), entitled Maximum capital gains rate, of section 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is hereby repealed.
